title: Upgrade GLM from 4.7 to 5, default Portkey gateway to production
author: voodoohop

gist.headline: GLM-5 has entered the chat
gist.blurb: We've upgraded our GLM integration to version 5! This massive 744B parameter model from Z.ai brings smarter reasoning and better responses to your prompts.
gist.summary: Upgraded the GLM text model from version 4.7 to 5, integrating Z.ai's latest 744B MoE model via Fireworks and updating the Portkey gateway configuration.
gist.impact: Users can now access the more powerful GLM-5 model for text generation, while maintaining backward compatibility for older aliases.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee mascot interacting with a large, glowing, futuristic monolith or server rack labeled 'GLM-5' in a cozy garden setting, symbolizing the powerful new model landing in our organic ecosystem.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot marveling at a large, glowing futuristic monolith labeled 'GLM-5' in a soft garden. Cozy 8-bit pixel art aesthetic. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. The bee wears a tiny futuristic visor. Chunky retro sprites. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley or A Short Hike. Text in pixel font: 'LEVEL 5'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
